member.name: T:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Controllers.ComparisonController
member.summary: Controller for handling query comparison requests.

member.name: M:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Controllers.ComparisonController.#ctor(DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Services.ComparisonService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Controllers.ComparisonController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The service for executing and comparing queries.
The logger instance used for logging information, warnings, and errors.

member.name: M:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Controllers.ComparisonController.CompareQueries(DynamicDashboardCommon.Models.QueryComparison)
member.summary: Compares the results of three SQL queries provided in the request.
member.param: The request containing the SQL queries to compare and other related information.
member.returns: An containing the comparison results or an error message.

member.name: T:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Services.ComparisonService
member.summary: Service for executing SQL queries and comparing datasets.

member.name: M:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Services.ComparisonService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The configuration instance used to retrieve the connection string.

member.name: M:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Services.ComparisonService.ExecuteQueryAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a SQL query asynchronously and returns the results as a list of dictionaries.
member.returns: A list of dictionaries representing the query results.

member.name: M:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Services.ComparisonService.CompareDatasets(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}})
member.summary: Compares two datasets regardless of row or column order.
member.returns: True if the datasets are identical; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DynamicDasboardWebAPI.Services.ComparisonService.DictionariesEqual(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.returns: True if the dictionaries are equal; otherwise, false.
